overview:
Jouko has more than ten years of experience in international mobile technology market. He started his career by founding Futuron Wireless Solutions, a company providing technology consultancy services in WAP, SMS and other wireless technologies.

Since then he has held various international technology management and marketing positions at Philips Consumer Electronics, Symbian and Nokia. More recently Mr Kaasila has been a board member at TSG Test Solutions, a quality assurance specialist company.

He holds an MBA from INSEAD and an MSc in Information Processing science from University of Oulu.
